text: Which one of the following regular expressions correctly represents the language of the finite automaton given below? b b a b @ A. ab*bab* + ba*aba* B. (ab*b)*ab* + (ba*a)*ba* C. (ab*b + ba*a)*(a* + b*) D. (ba*a + ab*b)*(ab* + ba*) gatecse-2022 theory-of-computation finite-automata regular-expression 1-mark
